taskDescription: When Chicago installed its Centennial Ferris wheel at Navy Pier in 1995, there was much discussion about how big it could be. The city wanted it to be as high as possible because the incredible views of the city would surely draw the tourists. It was decided that the height of the wheel could safely reach 150 ft. If the wheel begins 10 ft above ground level, what is the circumference of the Ferris wheel?
